/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/assignment.dir/assignment.cc.o  -o bin/assignment  -L/opt/local/lib  /usr/local/lib/libGLEW.dylib -framework OpenGL -lglfw3 /usr/local/lib/libGLEW.dylib /usr/local/lib/libjpeg.dylib -framework OpenGL -lglfw3 /usr/local/lib/libjpeg.dylib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/lib
